text: Apne product ka market mein ache se jaiza lein.  Wholesale sellers se contact karein, rates compare karein aur quality check karein. Google Trends aur Amazon ki top-rated products check kar ke trending products pe focus karein.
Apne business ka naam register karwayein aur bank account open karwayein.  Alag mobile number use karein business ke liye apne personal number ko protect karne ke liye.

TCS, Leopard, MNP ya kisi bhi courier company se contact karein. Unke saath proper deal karein aur unse different cities ke delivery rates pata karein.  Unke portal ka use kar ke apne parcels track karein.
Apne products ke liye flyers, boxes, tape aur printing papers ka proper hisab kitaba lagaein.  Achi quality packaging apne brand ki image ko improve karti hai.
Ek efficient team zaruri hai.  Kam se kam do log chahiye packaging, shipping aur inventory management ke liye.  Apni team ko proper training dein.

Google aur Facebook ads run karein apne products ko promote karne ke liye.  Har mahine ek choti si amount marketing pe zarur lagaein.  Apni website ko update rakhein aur uski speed check karte rahein.
Apne sabhi expenses (wholesale price, shipping, marketing, etc.) ko apne product ki price mein include karein.  Proper profit margin rakhein.
